jexer.bits

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • jexer.bits.Animation

  • public class Animation
extends Object
    An animation that can be displayed in an image.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Public constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Animation

        public Animation(List<BufferedImage> frames,
                 int frameDelay,
                 int frameLoops)
        Public constructor.
        Parameters:
        frames - the frames
        frameDelay - the number of millis to wait until next animation frame
        frameLoops - the number of times to loop the animation. 0 means play it once. -1 means to play it forever.
